comments.comment: RIP Maya, all of us will miss you.

We love you Maya, rest in peace sunshine

im actually on the verge of tears over these comments i feel like ive been watching this my whole life and edgar and maya have always been such a big part of these videos i feel its just so sad to see that all good things really must come to an end sooner or later
Rest in peace, Maya

Pewds : laughing at every tiktok
Maya : “I’ve never felt more disappointed”
Please be careful Felix, going onto Tik Tok without a level 3 cringe protection suit can hurt you. Stay Safe.
i love how twitter never fails to become more cringe over the years.
Thank you for being part of our Childhood. Rest in Peace Maya, We will Miss you.
Notice how Maya is hardly paying attention to the videos, she knows just doing her dog business is more intelligent than doing TikTok content

07:35 - I remember that one from back in the day in the mickey mouse magazine. They explained that this movement is more problematic for TALL people. short people have no problems at all, but the taller you are, the more complicated that move is for your body. Since Pewds can do it, it´s confirmed, he´s short!!

Pewd’s videos go by so fast. I’m always thinking, ‘Wait, there’s no way that was 15 minutes, it felt like 5!’
For so many other YouTubers, watching a 15 minute video feels like a goddamned prison sentence.
Rest In Peace, Maya

I know that the bar of cancelling someone on the internet nowadays is extremely low and bottom of the barrel, but this drama shows a whole new level of desperacy.
No wonder Pewds left twitter, It's just a hellhole full of barking dogs.

the girl at 5:48 is signing in american sign language. she has a cochlear implant on her right ear so yes she can hear with it on. it’s pretty common for people who are deaf to speak how they can and follow it with sign language 
thanks for coming to my ted talk!



edit:spelling
Just started watching again and could not believe how Maya looks compared to the last time I saw her. She's too precious, and I'm more than happy to see her again!
you know a youtuber is good when even their sponsor breaks are entertaining

Twitter's Guide to trying(and failing) to cancel PewDiePie:
1. Watch every video he makes(actively supporting him, despite hating him) waiting for a minor slip up or mistake
2. Take the smallest "evidence" and remove/ignore context
3. Spread that outofcontext content to Twitter
4. Demand an apology on behalf of a community that they may not even belong to
5. Rage at the support he still recieve as his fans know him better that you
6. Bring up old controversies and past mistakes because god forbid people regret, repent, and try to change to better their behavior
7. When apology is given...... rage about it
8. Go to sleep feeling accomplished as you believe you've done some good by screaming online
9. Repeat.
That deaf girl really acting like a victim like she was abused or something.
That dog is honestly one of the cutest little things I’ve ever seen. This really made my day! :D

I still can't believe there are people out there wishing him to die painfully just because trivial thing, they maybe think they are "the good people" by hoping that in this case, which is so disturbing..

My beloved dog passed away last week, so it warms my heart to see Maya & the love Felix so obviously has for her. Hugs your pets!! You never know when you’re gonna lose them.

The motive behind "canceling" someone is entirely self-centered. They want the attention of canceling someone. They want the likes and praise for condemning someone else.

Complete narcissism. It should be ignored entirely.

So crazy that you just cut out the part where you made fun of a deaf woman doing sign language and tried to play it off as her “showing off her nails”
all of these people are actually so mad lmao
It's always great to see more Maya. I can't believe how old she must be now!
I wouldn't even apologize for the deaf girl, people who take it out of context and not understand, he's talking about her nails.

People from Twitter thinking he mocked her shows how little they know about him and that they don't watch his videos. He always used that voice for Maya. They're just looking for someone to cancel so they can feel good about their progressiveness.

I don’t think Felix realized that one girl was deaf and using sign language.. then he proceeded to mock her using her hands while she spoke

Go back to his old videos people- its there.

Lol I watched this video yesterday and had no idea she was deaf either. I thought her hand movements were just some cringe tiktok movements.

Honestly, the baby voice guy sounds a lot more like a fairly competent attempt at a Sesame Street Muppet voice.  Leaning towards Elmo more than any other one of em.

“She has long nails”

Twitter: ARE YOU MAKING FUN OF DEAF PEOPLE?
The girl with long nails and 'silly' voice is a deaf creator and she was using ASL in her videos

He has literally been more chill than ever before and people still try to find a way to cancel him lmao. I'm so happy that stupid culture has been losing its power and dying off because my goodness, it was the most tamest thing I've ever seen. They basically want him to be the most boring guy that will never do or say anything resembling a joke
the girl with long nails and signing is deaf, she’s just telling a story in ASL… idk what’s cringe about that
The fact that Felix just mocked her nails and not the  disability of the person

It seems really clear that he wasn't aware she was deaf or signing.  He stopped the video immediately when he heard the nail sounds because he didn't want to sit through it.  Extremely animated gesticulation is a normal part a lot of people's every day expression.  It isn't unthinkable that it wasn't obvious that she was using sign language and moving the dog's paws around was imitating that, not mocking the act of signing itself.  If you have watched enough of Felix's videos you would be well aware that he has always used that and other similar voices for his pugs...  Sometimes people make simple, but unfortunate mistakes.  Not everything is a nefarious, pitted attack against an entire community.
Aw maya's so cute,  also nice to know the dogs are doing well
So glad the dogs are doing fine ️

For anyone wondering, at 5:24 with the lady filming her "landlord" it's just a skit. That is her husband, and she's the owner of the house. She made that tiktok to respond to criticism from people for letting her son with autism color on the walls with crayon.
Maya makes me smile, such a cute doggo ️

Its really refreshing to see you judge those "look at how miserable I am" videos, because we see them so often now on the internet that we have gotten far too used to them. You're right, its not normal. If these people need an outlet they need a good friend or a therapist to talk with about it, not a video that can give them placebo happiness through views and likes. 

Thanks for always keeping it real/keeping us grounded in reality.
